mapper.select: select us.user_id comqId,us.user_name comqName,us.*,c.* from pro_company_user us LEFT JOIN pro_certificate c ON us.user_id=c.fkcert_id where comq_id = #{comqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into pro_company_user (cp_user_id, comq_id, user_id, user_name, user_tel) values (#{cpUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into pro_company_user
cp_user_id,
comq_id,
user_id,
user_name,
user_tel,

#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update pro_company_user
comq_id = #{comqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_tel = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cp_user_id = #{cpUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
